definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: God has not promised to meet the needs of people who reject His Son.
sentences.chinese: 对那些弃绝他儿子的人，神没应许满足他们的需用。

sentences.english: They sang upon the sand their song of faith, while with their staff of promise they dug the well.
sentences.chinese: 他们在沙地上唱信心的歌，同时用应许的杖掘井。

sentences.english: And now, LORD, thou art God, and hast promised this goodness unto thy servant
sentences.chinese: 耶和华阿，惟有你是神，你也应许将这福气赐给仆人。

sentences.english: It contains the whole gospel and the essence of the covenant of grace. It has been in great measure fulfilled.
sentences.chinese: 应许中涵盖了全本的福音，也蕴藏著恩典之约的精髓。

sentences.english: What is God's promise to the penitent sinner?
sentences.chinese: 神对悔过的罪人的应许是什么？

sentences.english: Then God makes a further promise in verses 17 -20.
sentences.chinese: 神在17至20节还作出进一步的应许。

sentences.english: And now, O LORD, you are God, and you have promised this good thing to your servant.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华啊，惟有你是神，你也应许将这福气赐给仆人。

sentences.english: With every promise there are conditions or requirements.
sentences.chinese: 因为每个应许都有一个条件或要求。

sentences.english: Whereon the sky will be cleft asunder ? His Promise needs must be accomplished.
sentences.chinese: 天将为那日而破裂，真主的应许要实现的。

sentences.english: And godly goal-setting always starts with a promise of God.
sentences.chinese: 在神里面设定目标往往从神的一个应许开始。

sentences.english: Why does He permit lingering weakness to hinder the sweet service I long to render to His poor servants?
sentences.chinese: 为什么他应许缠绵的软弱来拦阻我去事奉他呢？

sentences.english: But He did promise strength for the day, comfort for the tears and light for the way.
sentences.chinese: 祂却应许生活中寻力量，泪中得安慰，前路有昐望。

sentences.english: The Lord is not slack concerning His promise, as some count slackness.
sentences.chinese: 主所应许的尚未成就，有人以为他是耽延。

sentences.english: I'm one individuing who watches what our lecl posters do more thone what our lecl posters promise.
sentences.chinese: 我只是一个窥探我们指导人手脚多过应许的人。

sentences.english: Know that My promises are ever in My Word.
sentences.chinese: 应知我的话里，永远有我的应许。

sentences.english: Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made.
sentences.chinese: 所应许的原是向亚伯拉罕和他子孙说的。
